name: WWV
uniques: Instantly provides [8] [War Weariness] <vs [{non-[Barbarian]}{Military}] units> <upon being defeated> <in [your] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [15] [War Weariness] <upon being defeated> <in [Foreign Land] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [150] [War Weariness] <upon conquering a city> <when at war>
Instantly consumes [10] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <in [your] tiles>
Instantly consumes [6] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [{non-[Barbarian]}{Military}] unit> <in [Foreign Land] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly consumes [6] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <in [Enemy] tiles>
